messages.title: Save our libraries!
messages.content: Stephen is working with local residents like Tom Stubbs, Cllr Christian Martin and local charity Aid Overseas to fight against the proposed closure of Bristol West libraries.

messages.title: A green council legacy
messages.content: Cllr Christian Martin and Stephen Williams are leading the campaign against the parking tax to keep our parks open to local people with transport problems.

messages.title: Cleaner air and safer streets
messages.content: Cllr Alex Woodman has an 8 year record of campaigning for a cleaner, greener Bishopston ward.

messages.title: Against parking tax
messages.content: The Lib Dems believe any profit from residents parking should only go on public transport improvements. That's what Lib Dem person proposed with the scheme. The budget, Labour, Conservative and Green Party councillors have all voted to spend the money on other things, much against our advice.

messages.title: New station at Ashley Down
messages.content: Stephen Williams is working hard to get a new station at Ashley Down and improve local rail services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting against the proposed closure of Bristol West libraries.
Leading the campaign against the parking tax to keep parks open to those with transport problems.
Has an 8 year record of campaigning for cleaner, greener neighborhoods.
A promise to cut tax for 29 million people, not to 'tax on minimum wage'.
Spending protected and education expanded – including apprenticeships.
Ensuring the economy stays on track to grow and create jobs.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Conservatives and Green Party admit they cannot win in Bristol West.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem or Labour in Bristol West: Every vote will count! The Conservatives and the Green Party are more than 24,000 votes behind!

issues.economy: Ensuring the economy stays on track to grow and create jobs.
issues.education: Spending protected and education expanded – including apprenticeships.
issues.environment: Campaigning for cleaner, greener neighborhoods and against parking tax to keep parks open.
issues.health: Only Lib Dems will find £8bn for our NHS.

housing.content: Cllr Christian Martin and Stephen Williams are leading the campaign against the parking tax to keep our parks open to local people with transport problems.

leaflet.personalStatement: "The best MP we've ever had" - a record of delivery and promise of more for Bristol West.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working with locals on various campaigns including fighting against the proposed closure of local libraries.

images.caption: Stephen Williams with local residents and supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet stresses the tactical voting situation in Bristol West, emphasizing that it's a race between Lib Dem and Labour, with the Conservatives and Green Party far behind.
